attributes.action: Motion to look at Primark's behaviour. Child labour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children as young as 11 from a refugee camp in India were used to make clothes that ended up on the shelves of UK retailer Primark.

The revelations are part of an investigation into Primark's supply chain in India.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title - it should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
